title: How AI Could Transform Email
description: Artificial intelligence may streamline a form of business communication that’s already super fake.

title: The Mountain Village in the Path of India’s Electric Dreams
description: The country has discovered enough lithium to electrify every vehicle on its roads, but the massive deposit has tensions running high.

title: Video Games Are a New Propaganda Machine for Iran
description: The state sponsors titles that cast it in a favorable light and punish indies for depicting a more complex vision of Iranian identity.
